    • match

      public EdgeNode match​(EdgeClient thisClient, java.util.List<EdgeNode> nodeListInput) throws NoNodeSatisfyRequirementException, NoNodeFoundInHistoryException
      score base match making function. Finding the best node to accomodate the client from a list of nodes.
      Specified by:
      match in interface MatchMakingAlgorithm
      Parameters:
      thisClient - client ID
      nodeListInput - list of nodes
      Returns:
      best node to connect to client

      NoNodeSatisfyRequirementException

    • getPing

      public long getPing​(EdgeClient thisClient, EdgeNode thisNode)
      Get Ping between client and node. This should be dynamic base on some short of triangulation if possible. Or just throw random number for now

      Ver 0.1: Using 2 int numbers, and calculate the distance between them. E.g: client at 8, and node A at 10 and B 5, So client is closer to node A than B.

      We can use this function for naive method implementation :))

      Parameters:
      thisClient - matching client
      thisNode - matching node
      Returns:
      pingResult - (network) distance between node and client
